title: Create a Campaign Project Plan
description: A project manager needs to create a detailed project plan for a new marketing campaign.

tasks.description: List all major tasks required for the campaign (e.g., 'Write copy', 'Design ads', 'Set up campaign', 'Report on results').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive work breakdown structure.

tasks.description: Assign an owner and a due date to each task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns all tasks to the appropriate team members.

tasks.description: Set up dependencies between tasks (e.g., 'Design ads' cannot start until 'Write copy' is complete).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a Gantt chart or timeline view with clear dependencies.
